definition: fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)
fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]

sentences.english: To keep a fresh supply take one or two cloves from each bulb and replant them.
sentences.chinese: 保持新鲜供给要花一至两丁香每个灯泡和补种。

sentences.english: Clove encounter on the way home, orb said pearl.
sentences.chinese: 丁香在回家的路上碰到宝珠，宝珠说珍珠事了。

sentences.english: Colours are another popular area for experiments that yield toned-down shades like lilac, apricot or brown.
sentences.chinese: 流行颜色偏柔和，如紫丁香，杏色或棕色。

sentences.english: Pepper, Chilli, Coriander Leaf, Cloves , Herbal Spices (Organic.
sentences.chinese: 采购产品胡椒粉，智利，芫荽叶，丁香，草药的药料。

sentences.english: If tired, smell a whiff of clove oil and it will wake you up.
sentences.chinese: 如果疲倦，闻上一点丁香油将令人清醒。

sentences.english: Lilac Wine, I feel unready for my love.
sentences.chinese: 丁香酒，我仍未准备好迎接爱情。

sentences.english: But my heart refused to let the optimism that the lilacs had brought to me fade.
sentences.chinese: 但我内心深处不愿意让紫丁香刚刚带给我的期待消失。

sentences.english: The nose shows black pepper and cloves aromas, with good spiciness.
sentences.chinese: 呈现良好的黑胡椒及丁香的气味。

sentences.english: Liu xuan to the snack bar to find cloves, learned that jade beads back.
sentences.chinese: 刘璇到小吃店去找丁香，得知玉珠回城了。

sentences.english: In the meantime, mixzinc oxide and oil of cloves into a white paste.
sentences.chinese: 同时，把氧化锌和丁香油和成白色的膏。

sentences.english: DXY is short for lilac garden in Chinese Pinyin.
sentences.chinese: 丁香园的愿景是，让健康更多，让疾病更少。

sentences.english: Cloves also ranked very high in antioxidant properties in one study.
sentences.chinese: 在一项研究中，丁香的抗氧化作用排名非常高。

sentences.english: The sheen of my sandals is dulled by the dust of cloves.
sentences.chinese: 我的凉鞋蒙上了丁香的灰尘。

sentences.english: In some top-fermented beers, however, this flavor is essential.
sentences.chinese: 丁香类香味是上面发酵小麦啤酒不可或缺的特殊香味。

sentences.english: Come and see the cloves, at this time, liu xuan purchase jade bead avoided.
sentences.chinese: 这时，刘璇买了东西过来看丁香，玉珠回避了。

sentences.english: A few yards away, the lilacs hung heavy in the rain.
sentences.chinese: 几码远外，丁香花在雨里沉甸甸地挂在枝上。

definition: nutmeg (Myristica fragrans Houtt)/mace/Myristicaceae (family of plants producing aromatic or hallucinogenic oils)
cardamom (Elettaria cardamomum)/fig. a girl's teenage years/maidenhood/a budding beauty
Amomom (fructus Amomi), plant used in Chinese medicine
